forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain diminishing to a few showers by morning. Low 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 16C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
